name: The Horseshoe
description:
Ah.  There's a bit of an issue.  You appear to have a small, completely not alarming infestation of peex.  Don't worry!  It's not many so... oh, baskets.  There appears to be more coming.  And their joining the peex's teams.  Oh, pancakes.  Oh, pancakes, indeed.

Well, I suppose that just means you'll be busy trying to keep the teams happy.  But not too happy, for... reasons I'm sure you understand.  Just a nice middle ground.  The, uh, the red peex appear to be requesting something.  Oh, but the green peex don't seem to have enjoyed that happy that you built.  What's that?  You closed a multi now purple and blue are mad?  I thought blue didn't like purple...  I'm sure you'll figure all this out.  Just do what you think is best to keep everyone in the middle.

Features you say?  Well...

  • What about earning bits?
  • Earning more bits?
  • Run based game play?
  • Uh...
  • Certainly are a lot of peex.
  • You may want to do something about this.
  • They appear to be unhappy!

Remember: the middle is best in the Horseshoe.
